N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-13.2 - Boiler openings

State Regulations
(a) Openings required. Boiler openings must meet the requirements of section IV
of the ASME Code. (b) Threaded openings. All threaded openings in a boiler shall be tapped into
material having a minimum thickness as specified for the various standard pipe
